verses.name: Genesis 25:18
verses.text: And they dwelt from Havilah unto Shur, that is before Egypt, as thou goest toward Assyria: and he died in the presence of all his brethren.

verses.name: Genesis 25:19
verses.text: And these are the generations of Isaac, Abraham’s son: Abraham begat Isaac:

verses.name: Genesis 25:20
verses.text: And Isaac was forty years old when he took Rebekah to wife, the daughter of Bethuel the Syrian of Padan–aram, the sister to Laban the Syrian.

verses.name: Genesis 25:21
verses.text: And Isaac intreated the Lord for his wife, because she was barren: and the Lord was intreated of him, and Rebekah his wife conceived.
